^(allow_missing)$.description:
If set to true, and the issue is not found, a new issue will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

^(update_mask)$.description: The list of fields to update.

allowMissing.description:
If set to true, and the issue is not found, a new issue will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

issue.description:
The issue's `name` field is used to identify the issue to update.
 Format: projects/{project}/issues/{issue}
issue.title: The issue to update.

updateMask.description: The list of fields to update.
